Package nl.saxion.ptbc

Class SaSaCommunicator

java.lang.Object
nl.saxion.ptbc.SaSaCommunicator
public class SaSaCommunicator extends Object
SaSaCommunicator is the library class to use to connect to the SaSaServer on the (virtual) satellite.

    static final String

    Default port number for the SaSaServer

  • Constructor Details

    • SaSaCommunicator

      public SaSaCommunicator(String name, String host, int port)
      Create a client to the SaSaServer and connect to it
      Parameters:
      name - name of the client
      host - hostname or IP-address of the SaSaServer
      port - port theSaSaServer listens to

    • SaSaCommunicator

      public SaSaCommunicator(String name)
      Create a client to the default SaSaServer and connect to it
      Parameters:
      name - name of the client

  • Method Details

    • getMessages

      public final List<String> getMessages()
      Get the waiting messages (to be processed).
      Returns:
      a list of waiting messages

    • isConnected

      public final boolean isConnected()
      Determine if the current client is connected to the SaSaServer
      Returns:
      if the current client is connected

    • connect

      public void connect(String host, int port)
      Connects with the SaSaServer which, on success, sends the message "client-name CONNECTED".
      Parameters:
      host - : SaSaServer hostname or ip address
      port - : SaSaServer port

    • send

      public void send(String message)
      Send a message to all other clients of the SaSaServer
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send (without the name of the sendig client, which will automatically be prepended)

    • close

      public final void close()
      Close the connection to the SaSaServer

    • sleep

      public void sleep(int ms)
      Sleep (wait) the given number of milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      ms - time to sleep in milliseconds
